question:

[Donald]'s aunt [Valerie] took him to the store to do some last minute party shopping. [Kerrie] and [Victor] are siblings who are enjoying lunch together. [Dale] took his nephew [Scott] out to get some ice cream to celebrate his baseball victory. [Ouida] was always arguing with her mother's husband [Dale]. [Ouida] and her brother [Donald] went to see a movie. [Victor] took his sister [Kerrie] out to lunch after learning that she got accepted into her first choice for university. [Harry] was so excited to surprise his son, [Victor], with the tickets to the playoffs.
Question: How is [Valerie] related to [Machelle]?
